title: 5Ksana_HandMade
author: 5Ksana_HandMade
content: Condition: MINT 100% HandMade by 5KsanaAs the name suggests, this fine embroidery was inspired by Bitcoin!My Christmas toys-embroideries "Bitcoin" are a true poetry of folk art, a message embroidered on «magic» fabric.My embroidery evokes the transmission of knowledge between generations.The fate of the BITCOIN can only be changed by Christmas!So we think about winning and we will go only forward.Quantity: 3 pcs. (selling the set of 3 toys)Material: piece of fabric (100% cotton); beads; sequins; threads; satin ribbon;Dimension: wide – 10 cm ( 3.9 inch) ; height – 14 cm ( 5.5 inch)Shipping (worldwide): freeAbout ME https://5ksana.art/about/ You can see my other artworks BITCOINART on my website https://5ksana.art/category/bitcoinart/ BTC_______________________________________________________________________________ _________________________________________________________Bid Format: Bids only in BTCReserve Price:  0.014 BTCStarting Bid: 0 BTC                             Bid Inc.: 0.001 BTCAuction Ends:  Friday, November  11th  12:00 PST
